name: PUSH! PUSH! PUSH!
description:
Inspired by the noble art of pushing Japanese inside trains

comes........

PUSH! PUSH! PUSH!

PUSH! PUSH! PUSH! is a game about overloading trains!!! The station is a complete mess of people, chaos!!! Take your excavator and push the travellers into the trains but caution! Every wagon requires a different kind of people, moreover, durian fruit is totally forbidden! Its smells is crazy!!

🚈🚃🚃🚃       🧍🧍‍♀️🧍‍♂️         👷 Instructions

Mouse movement: Moves the excavator to the desired direction.

Mouse Left Click: PUSHHH. The excavator does a dash.

Esc: Pauses the game.

We hope you enjoy it!!!



Marc Gálvez
Jaume Montagut
Antoni Garí
Brián Piancino
Ivan Macià
Sergi Vila
